amendatorysection.para: Campus, as it pertains to the southern boundary of the main campus of the University of Nebraska-Lincoln, means the south right-of-way line of R Street and abandoned R Street from 10th to 17th streets and, as it pertains to the western boundary of the main campus of the University of Nebraska-Lincoln, means the east right-of-way line of 10th Street from R Street to Holdrege Street (Salt Creek Roadway).
